name: ishader
title: iShader
description: Apply artistic shader effects to images including dithering, ASCII art, and brick-style transformations with real-time preview

commands.name: ishader
commands.title: Image Shader
commands.description: Apply shader effects to images with real-time preview

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1

author: egirlevadniy
